Injure.definition: to interfere with or violate the legally protected interests of

1.definition: to interfere with or violate the legally protected interests of

sub_terms.a: to harm the physical, emotional, or mental well-being of
sub_terms.b: to cause (another) to suffer from damage to, deprivation of, or interference with property or a property interest
sub_terms.c: to violate the constitutionally or otherwise legally protected rights of

2.definition: to mar or impair the soundness or appearance of (as a building)
